section.title: Query Manager Editor
section.para: Query Manager Editor is a default editor used when opening Query Mapping XML file at Anyframe Query Manager Perspective and provides Query Test Editor and functions of add/update/delete Query manually. To open Query Mapping file through Query Manager Editor, select "Open With > Query Manager Editor" on Context Menu of the file.

Query Manager Editor provides two expression ways; Design tab and Source tab.
Design tab
Expresses the structural format of Query Mapping XML file in grid. Can add add/update/delete file, Query search and specific attribute through Context Menu.
Source tab
Expresses XML tag of Query Mapping XML file in source format. Can perform Query Wizard execution and Query search and Java Class Navigation, etc. for Query add/update through Context Menu. In addition, for skilled users, various tags that can be used in Query Mapping XML file are provided through Content Assist, therefore faster and more convenient file edit is possible.
